remarks: Double restricted quantification over the union of a set and a singleton, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 17-Nov-2012.)
statement:
2ralunsn.1 $e |- ( x = B -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
2ralunsn.2 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
2ralunsn.3 $e |- ( x = B -> ( ps <-> th ) ) $.
2ralunsn $p |- ( B e. C -> ( A. x e. ( A u. { B } ) A. y e. ( A u. { B } ) ph <-> ( ( A. x e. A A. y e. A ph /\ A. x e. A ps ) /\ ( A. y e. A ch /\ th ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ps y $.
$d th x $.
